I will protect Miki-chan...\""},{"lineNumber":240328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、俺が敵だったら守れないところだったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, if I had been the enemy, you wouldn't have been able to protect Miki-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":240331,"originalJapaneseLine":"洞窟の中から美樹ちゃんがランス達を覗いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan was peeking at Rance and the others from inside the anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":240334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":240335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜ざくーっ！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<thrust!>"},{"lineNumber":240336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun!?\""},{"lineNumber":240337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うひょー、魔人の斬り心地最高ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Woohoo, slashing a demon feels awesome!\""},{"lineNumber":240338,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはサクッとカオスで健太郎を突き刺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance quickly stabbed Kentaro with Chaos."},{"lineNumber":240339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう、ぐ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Agh, ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":240340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃ……ん……逃げ……て……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan... run... away...\""},{"lineNumber":240341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がくっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*collapse*..."},{"lineNumber":240342,"originalJapaneseLine":"哀れ、健太郎は無惨に死んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Poor Kentaro died pitifully."},{"lineNumber":240343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、始末完了ー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, cleanup complete!"},{"lineNumber":240344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これで美樹ちゃん攻略の邪魔者が消えたぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now the obstacle to conquering Miki-chan is gone!\""},{"lineNumber":240345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A, a, a...\""},{"lineNumber":240346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けん、たろ、くん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ken, ta, ro, kun..."},{"lineNumber":240347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　けんたろう、くん……けんたろうくん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro-kun... Kentaro-kun...\""},{"lineNumber":240348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":240349,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美樹ちゃんの様子が」","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki-chan's condition is..."},{"lineNumber":240350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アハハハハハハハハハハハ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahahahahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":240351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh!?\""},{"lineNumber":240352,"originalJapaneseLine":"突如笑い出した美樹を見て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing Miki suddenly laugh,"},{"lineNumber":240353,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルが慌てて駆け寄る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiru hurriedly rushed over."},{"lineNumber":240354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん！　しっかりして！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan! Pull yourself together!"},{"lineNumber":240355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私のことが分かる！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you understand me!?\""},{"lineNumber":240356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":240357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……もう我慢する必要……ないんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There's no need to endure anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":240358,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なくなっちゃった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's gone."},{"lineNumber":240359,"originalJapaneseLine":"　耐えていた理由……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason I was holding on...\""},{"lineNumber":240360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いっぱい、いっぱい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A lot, a lot..."},{"lineNumber":240361,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いーーっぱい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So many...\""},{"lineNumber":240362,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気が狂いそうなほど我慢した、けど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I endured so much I almost went crazy, but...\""},{"lineNumber":240363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう駄目」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":240364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":240365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぜんぶきえちゃえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let it all disappear.\""},{"lineNumber":240366,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":240367,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":240368,"originalJapaneseLine":"辺りが真っ白に染まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The surroundings turned pure white."},{"lineNumber":240369,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは巨大な爆発によるもの。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was caused by a massive explosion."},{"lineNumber":240370,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが爆発に飲み込まれる寸前、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just before Rance was engulfed by the explosion,"},{"lineNumber":240371,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬だけ視界に映ったのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"What flashed momentarily in his view was..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は元に戻ったのかと思ったが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At first, I thought it had returned to normal..."
"Eh... I can't do it though... eh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は溜め息をついた。
「……だから貴方には黙っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's why I kept it a secret from you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひいきー！　ひいきじゃー！」
「？　なにを言っとるのだお前は」
健太郎が苦しげに呻いていた。
死んでもいいかなーって程度には攻撃したんだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I did attack to the point where you could have died though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……美樹ちゃんは僕、が、守る……」
「ふん、俺が敵だったら守れないところだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, if I had been the enemy, you wouldn't have been able to protect her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の中から美樹ちゃんがランス達を覗いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki-chan was peeking at Rance and the others from inside the cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけでお前はもういらない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, we don't need you anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うひょー、魔人の斬り心地最高ー！」
ランスはサクッとカオスで健太郎を突き刺した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance quickly stabbed Kentaro with Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 哀れ、健太郎は無惨に死んだ。
これで美樹ちゃん攻略の邪魔者が消えたぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now the obstacle to conquering Miki-chan is gone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けんたろう、くん……けんたろうくん……」
「アハハハハハハハハハハハ！」
突如笑い出した美樹を見て、
シィルが慌てて駆け寄る。
「美樹ちゃん！　しっかりして！
「……もう我慢する必要……ないんだ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason I was holding on..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気が狂いそうなほど我慢した、けど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I endured so much I almost went crazy, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辺りが真っ白に染まる。
それは巨大な爆発によるもの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was caused by a massive explosion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが爆発に飲み込まれる寸前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just before Rance was engulfed by the explosion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬だけ視界に映ったのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What flashed momentarily in his view was...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は元に戻ったのかと思ったが……」

"Eh... I can't do it though... eh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光は溜め息をついた。
「……だから貴方には黙っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's why I kept it a secret from you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひいきー！　ひいきじゃー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, if I had been the enemy, you wouldn't have been able to protect her."

ランスはサクッとカオスで健太郎を突き刺した。

これで美樹ちゃん攻略の邪魔者が消えたぞー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason I was holding on..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I endured so much I almost went crazy, but..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just before Rance was engulfed by the explosion,
